member.name: IDWriteStringList.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of strings in the string list.
member.returns: Returns the number of strings in the string list.

member.name: IDWriteStringList.GetLocaleName
member.summary: Copies the locale name with the specified index to the specified array.
member.param: Zero-based index of the locale name.
Character array that receives the locale name.
Size of the array in characters. The size must include space for the terminating null character.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteStringList.GetLocaleNameLength
member.summary: Gets the length in characters (not including the null terminator) of the locale name with the specified index.
member.param: Zero-based index of the locale name.
Receives the length in characters, not including the null terminator.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteStringList.GetString
member.summary: Copies the string with the specified index to the specified array.
member.param: Character array that receives the string.
Size of the array in characters. The size must include space for the terminating null character.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteStringList.GetStringLength
member.summary: Gets the length in characters (not including the null terminator) of the string with the specified index.
member.param: Receives the length in characters of the string, not including the null terminator.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteStringList
member.summary: Represents a collection of strings indexed by number.An IDWriteStringList is identical to IDWriteLocalizedStrings except for the semantics, where localized strings are indexed on language (each language has one string property) whereas IDWriteStringList may contain multiple strings of the same language, such as a string list of family names from a font set. You can QueryInterface from an IDWriteLocalizedStrings to an IDWriteStringList.
